Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First I need to identify the anomalies from the given profile Looking at the pairs - R to P 25 hours with low STDEV Hmm thats unusually high and tight Maybe theres a rigid approval process but the low STDEV suggests its consistently delayed possibly due to manual checks - P to N 7 days average with high STDEV This is way too long Maybe a backlog in notifications or a manual approval loop thats not automated - A to C 2 hours with moderate STDEV Wait thats fast but no steps like E or P in between Could mean some claims are closed without proper evaluation maybe a batch process closing quickly - E to N 5 minutes STDEV is actually very tight That might indicate a skip in steps like evaluating but not sending updates assuming approval

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Then possible reasons Manual overrides system glitches skipping steps bottlenecks or resource issues

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For verification queries I need to check specific time intervals For example query claims where R to P took longer than average plus STDEV Also check if certain adjusters or regions have more delays Another query could look for long E to C times maybe linking to specific resources Also check if approve P is followed by close C without assign A which should not happen

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
